Question.Subject: Arriving in Auckland on a direct flight from Canada.?
Question.Content: Will we be allowed to take duty free bottles onto our connecting flight to Christchurch? In our hand luggage or do we have to put it into our checked luggage?

ChosenAnswer: Yes. I don't think it matters

Answers.Answer: Yes you can carry your duty free bottles, and liquids onto your connection as it is only a domestic flight :-)
